means: 奇帕维安族（北美印第安之一族，在加拿大西北部阿塔帕斯坎），奇帕维安人[语]

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the Athapaskan people living in western Canada between Great Slave Lake and Hudson Bay
2. the language spoken by the Chipewyan people

auth_sentence.content: This belief has been propagated by a General Practitioner who is a resident of Fort Chipewyan.
auth_sentence.res_content: This belief has been propagated by a General Practitioner who is a resident of Fort Chipewyan.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This belief has been propagated by a General Practitioner who is a resident of Fort Chipewyan.

auth_sentence.content: Fort Chipewyan is one such group so passing through there one might view it as relatively impoverished and oppressed.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fort Chipewyan is one such group so passing through there one might view it as relatively impoverished and oppressed.
